select count(*) as outTerm from (select count(*) from auction where id=#{id} and a_num not in ( select a_num from catch ) and a_price < (select max(a_price) from auction a, product p where a.p_num = p.p_num and p_status = 6 ) UNION
select count(*) from catch c, auction a where c.a_num = a.a_num and c.a_num not in (select a_num from orders) and a.id = #{id} UNION
select count(*) from orders o, order_delivery od, auction a where o.o_num = od.o_num and od.d_status not in (3) and a.a_num = o.a_num and id=#{id} )
